title: Reading Time
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Maki-chan, thank you for taking me today<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Don’t mention it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru has always wanted to go to this cafe. A reading cafe where you can read books in silence<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I just happened to know the place, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe. Maru brought some books that Maru thought would be good to read here zura. Here’s one for you too, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh? For me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah. You love music, right, Maki-chan? This one’s story is about the life of a musician<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm.... Thanks. If it’s something you picked, then it’ll surely be interesting, Hanamaru<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru can confidently recommend it zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Alright then, let’s go in. No private conversations are allowed inside. This place is for reading books quietly and enjoying your tea. Let’s talk about the books after we’re done.... okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
